name: Jeholopterus
description: The Jeholopterus is a small aerial dinosaur with keen sight and remarkable agility, featuring a sleek body and wings that enable rapid flight.
memorable: Its blood-draining ability allows it to sap the strength of foes over time, making it a strategic threat despite its low hit points.
goals: To engage and weaken larger creatures by draining their blood from a safe distance.
relations: Often encountered in areas populated by other small or solitary flying beasts.
environment: Typically found in forested or open areas where it can take advantage of its flying speed.
strengths: Boasts high agility with a flying speed and the Flyby ability, making it difficult to pin down in combat.
weaknesses: Low hit points and average strength make it fragile in direct confrontations.
attacks: Blood Drain delivers significant piercing damage and ongoing health loss, while claw attacks deal slashing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Blood Drain allows it to attach to foes and drain their health over multiple turns.
senses: The Jeholopterus has keen sight, granting it advantage on perception checks that rely on sight.
skills: It has a passive perception score of 13, indicating decent awareness.
additional_information: Low intelligence indicates a lack of reasoning.
Uses Flyby ability to avoid retaliation during flight.
Attaches to victims and continues to drain their hit points each turn.
Very low charisma suggests it doesn't engage socially.
Dexterity allows it to evade and maneuver effectively.
test_queries: small flying dinosaur that drains blood
nimble aerial beast with blood-draining attack
elusive dinosaur with keen sight and agility
mobile creature that avoids attacks while flying
